title: Gold ( TIer 3) Clash team Looking for a Support and Jungler.
body:
Looking for an active and social Support/Jungle for flex and clash on weekends. WIll be taking it seriously although with a lighthearted atmosphere. Looking for people dedicated to improving as individual players and as a team over coming weeks.

Not interested in people looking to do clash once, or people that get burned out after a bad scrim/que session.

Add Novah ingame for a chat :)

replies.body: Hi me and a friend are both interested we are both gold 5
